name: CloudCreo
overview:
Cloud Creo provides Virtualization & Cloud (Public/Private/Hybrid) Migration services, Products, Solutions & Strategies to maximize IT efficiencies.

Areas of specialization include: Data Center and Desktop Virtualization; Cloud Assessment, Advanced Sizing and Landscape Design, Migrations - Physical to Virtual (P2V) and to Cloud (P2C).

Applications supported include: Enterprise Custom & Packaged Apps including SAP, Oracle Apps, PeopleSoft, SQL Server Apps, Sybase as well as Enterprise Email. Collaboration Apps including (IBM, MS, Google) & United Communication Apps (IBM, MS)

We have developed a Vendor agnostic Cloud Management Platform & Cloud Appliance factory. This tool can accelerate provisioning & deployment of Applications / VMs into Private or Public Clouds and offers portability between the two. It also allows for Automation & Life Cycle management and monitoring of these appliances. One can push automatic platform & version specific applications, data patches & updates to one’s nodes, automatic daily / weekly data refreshes at a click of a button. While improving IT agility, scalability & sustainability, this tool can dramatically reduce IT costs.
